definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: In the paper a new method for solving the position-al and metrical problems in four-dimensi…
sentences.chinese: 爲解決四維空間的定位及度量問題提供了一種新方法。

sentences.english: An intensive discussion is presented of the four-dimensional description for one-dimensionally modulated structures.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一維調製結構的四維空間描述方法。

sentences.english: Science writer Gleick takes a panoramic approach to the fourth dimension, a subject that fascinated the fin de siècle scientific world.
sentences.chinese: 科學作家格萊克對第四維空間進行了全景式的描繪。

sentences.english: The modulated vector and the four dimensional index of all Bragg reflections of incommensurately modulated structures were determined.
sentences.chinese: 據此對單晶衍射數據進行了四維空間的指標化。

sentences.english: It is mainly the light and space sequence that create the four-dimensional space.
sentences.chinese: 光和空間序列是創造四維空間的主要元素。
